text: Shift in balance of arms in Ukraine underscored by fresh data"🚨💥New data reveals a significant shift in the balance of heavy weapons in Ukraine's battlefields! 💪🏻🇺🇦 Kyiv's backers have delivered 471 new tanks, with 286 still to arrive, while Russia's tank fleet has halved! 🤯🔥 It's time for Putin to realize that his aggression won't fly! 💪🏻🇺🇦
